description:
Dashboard Utilities is a set of nine small utilities that run right on webOS's dashboard.  This set includes a Time Tracker, Checklist, multiple timers, counters, a random number generator, & a time zone viewer.  Each of these utilities is designed to run in it's own dashboard along with your other webOS notifications.  You will no longer need to keep multiple application's open all day when all you need is a simple timer, checklist, or other utility.  These utilities will stay minimized and out of your way until you need them.

You can also create App Launcher shortcuts that will open specific checklists, timers, or other utilities.

This application is also great for Touchstone users, as you will be able to view each utility while your phone charges.

Updates:
1.0.8: Redesigned the timer pages.  You can now start a timer from the app before you send it to the dashboard.
1.0.7: More Themes!  Changed the "minimized" icon.  Added European timezones.  Other minor changes
1.0.6:  You can now tap on dashboards while phone is locked (i.e. when on the Touchstone Charger).  Also added Time Zones (Beta) utility.  More on this utility coming soon.
1.0.5:  Checklist utility completely remodeled.  You can now add as many lists as you want, add shortcuts to specific lists, and some other minor options.  Added another theme as well.
1.0.6: Bug Fixes

Features coming soon: More utilities,  time tracker launcher shortcuts, and some more features.

If anyone has any ideas for other "utilities" that they think would run well from the dashboard, please e-mail them to the developer at machiapps1@gmail.com.
